title: Goodbye VR Headsets, HELLO VR GLASSES!
description:
Hello and welcome to TUESDAY NEWSDAY! Your number one resource for the entire weeks worth of VR news! This week we cover the Kat Walk C 2, new display research from Nvidia and Stanford, Meta cutting back on employees, the cheapest Oculus Quest 2 deal out there and so much more! Hope you enjoy this week of VR news!
